results.title: Bioactivity of Farnesyltransferase Inhibitors Against Entamoeba histolytica and Schistosoma mansoni
results.text_hl: Also, of a number of statins tested, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ exhibited moderate anti-@<m>DISEASE_Amebiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000562 @@@amebic@@@ activity which, when combined with @CHEMICAL_lonafarnib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C115354 @@@lonafarnib@@@, resulted in slight synergism.

citations.NLM: Probst A, Nguyen TN, El-Sakkary N, Skinner D, Suzuki BM, Buckner FS, Gelb MH, Caffrey CR, Debnath A. Bioactivity of Farnesyltransferase Inhibitors Against Entamoeba histolytica and Schistosoma mansoni Front Cell Infect Microbiol. 2019;9():180. PMID: 31192168
